classes.docstring:
"""
    A specification for a token class.
    """
classes.name: Tok

classes.docstring:
"""
    A JavaScript lexer

    >>> lexer = JsLexer()
    >>> list(lexer.lex("a = 1"))
    [('id', 'a'), ('ws', ' '), ('punct', '='), ('ws', ' '), ('dnum', '1')]

    This doesn't properly handle non-ASCII characters in the JavaScript source.
    """
classes.name: JsLexer
